welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Newnan, a charming, historic city known for its southern hospitality and picturesque downtown. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for all international flights at Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at College Park Airport provides a luxurious and exclusive experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calloway Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Calloway Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
